modeValues.settingInterpretation: Display shows one blinking red charge block.
Display shows one solid red charge block.
Display shows two orange charge blocks.
Display shows three yellow charge blocks.
Display shows four green charge blocks.
Display shows five blue charge blocks.

parameters.name: Mode
parameters.description: Expects values 0-6. Setting this, will let the charge display of the Battery show the according charge value for about a second. Afterwards it will switch back to showing the actual charge value. This influences the "Mode" output as well. (See Mode Values.)

parameters.name: Lock
parameters.description: Locks the Battery, when set to 1. Unlocks it, when set to 0.

parameters.name: On
parameters.description: Turns the Battery on, when set to 1. Turns it off, when set to 0.

outputs.name: Mode
outputs.description: Returns the current charge display value as a value in the range 0-6. (See Mode Values.)

outputs.name: Error
outputs.description: Returns whether the Battery is flashing an error. (0 for no, 1 for yes)

outputs.name: Lock
outputs.description: Returns whether the Battery is locked. (0 for no, 1 for yes)

outputs.name: Charge
outputs.description: Returns the current charge of the Battery in watt*tic.

outputs.name: Maximum
outputs.description: Returns the maximum charge of the Battery in watt*tic.

outputs.name: Ratio
outputs.description: Returns a range from 0.0 to 1.0. Returns the current charge percentage of the battery.

outputs.name: PowerPotential
outputs.description: Returns the current power potential at the input of the Battery in watts.

outputs.name: PowerActual
outputs.description: Returns the amount of power, currently being output by the Battery in watts.

outputs.name: On
outputs.description: Returns whether the Battery is currently on. (0 for no, 1 for yes)
